review: I met the doctor for my baby. ****** *** **** ***** I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. She advised what to do and what not to do after the baby feed. There was no waiting time in the hospital and she was very friendly. Issue was baby was not able to take feed properly, it was colic pain. Doctor guided me on what to do while breastfeeding. Hospitality, ambience was very good and doctor was friendly.
Mam was very friendly by Explaining of health issue and I'm visiting from age, 10 till now I'm very satisfied with mam
